usage.get_all_data: GET ./versions.json - Complete database with all shortcut information
usage.get_shortcuts_list: GET ./shortcuts-list.json - Simple list of shortcut names and versions
usage.get_specific_shortcut: GET ./versions.json then filter by shortcut ID

example_ios_shortcut_usage.step3: Add 'Get Value for Key' action to get shortcuts.SHORTCUT_ID.version
